title: Stewed Chicken Soup
description: Saute 1 or 2 onions, add 4 garlic cloves, add chicken thighs/drumsticks and stir to coat chicken. Add 5 cups water, 3-4 diced potatoes, 3 diced carrots, 1-2 stalks diced celery, 1 tsp salt. Bring to boil, then turn down heat, cover pot and cook for 30-35 minutes. You could add any other veggies that you have on hand.
